schema.title: Automation Rule Definitions
schema.description: This schema is used for verification of JSON objects used for creation of Automation Rule Objects.

name.title: Rule name
name.description: Short (one word) user friendly name of the Rule.

uid.title: Rule UID
uid.description: An unique identifier of the Rule in scope of the Rule Engine.

tags.title: Rule Tags
tags.description: Non-hierarchical keywords or terms describing the Rule. They help to classify the rules and allow them to be found.

items.title: Tag
items.description: Keyword or term describing the Rule.

description.title: Rule Description
description.description: A brief description of what the rule is and for what it is used.

configDescriptions.title: Rule Configuration Descriptor
configDescriptions.description: Used to describe the configuration parameters of the Rule.

items.title: Configuration Property Description
items.description: Description of property for configuring the Rule.

name.title: Configuration Parameter Name
name.description: Identifies uniquely the configuration parameter in scope of the Rule.

type.title: Configuration Parameter Type
type.description: Property declaring the data type of the configuration parameter.

label.title: Configuration Parameter Label
label.description: A human understandable label of the Configuration Parameter.

description.title: Configuration Parameter Description
description.description: A human understandable description of the Configuration Parameter.

required.title: Required Configuration Parameter
required.description: Specifies whether the value is required.

min.title: Configuration Parameter Minimum Allowed Value
min.description: The minimal value for numeric types, or the minimal length of strings, or the minimal number of selected options.

max.title: Configuration Parameter Maximum Allowed Value
max.description: The maximal value for numeric types, or the maximal length of strings, or the maximal number of selected options.

step.title: Configuration Parameter Step
step.description: The value granularity for a numeric value

pattern.title: Configuration Parameter Pattern
pattern.description: The regular expression for a text type.

readOnly.title: Readable Configuration Parameter
readOnly.description: Specifies whether the value is read-only.

multiple.title: Multiple Configuration Parameter
multiple.description: Specifies whether multiple selections of options are allowed.

multipleLimit.title: Multiple Configuration Parameter Limit
multipleLimit.description: Specifies the maximum number of options that can be selected when multiple is true.

context.title: Configuration Parameter Context
context.description: Serves to determine how to treat the value of the Configuration Parameter.

defaultValue.title: Configuration Parameter Default Value
defaultValue.description: Declaring a default value for the Configuration Parameter if missing.

unit.title: Configuration Parameter Unit
unit.description: Specifies the unit of measurements for the configuration parameter.

unitLabel.title: Configuration Parameter Unit Label
unitLabel.description: Specifies the unit label for the configuration parameter. This attribute can also be used to provide natural language units as iterations, runs, etc.

filterCriteria.title: Configuration Parameter Filter
filterCriteria.description: Criteria for dynamic selection of values.

options.title: Configuration Parameter Options
options.description: List of definitions of the parameter for static selection.

limitToOptions.title: limit To Options
limitToOptions.description: Specifies that the users input is limited to the options list. When set to true without options, this should have no affect. When set to true with options, the user can only select the options from the list When set to false with options, the user can enter values other than those in the list.

groupName.title: Configuration Parameter Group Name
groupName.description: A string used to group parameters together into logical blocks so that the UI can display them together.

advanced.title: An Advanced Configuration Parameter
advanced.description: Specifies if this is an advanced parameter. An advanced parameter can be hidden in the UI to focus the user on important configuration.

configuration.title: Rule Configuration
configuration.description: Used to define values of the configuration parameters of the Rule.

triggers.title: Trigger Modules
triggers.description: Contains definitions of the Trigger Modules of the Rule.

items.title: Trigger Module
items.description: Defines the fact which triggers the Rule execution.

id.title: Trigger ID
id.description: Identifies uniquely the Module in scope of the Rule.

label.title: Trigger Label
label.description: Short (one word) user friendly name of the Module.

description.title: Trigger Description
description.description: A brief description of what the Trigger is and for what it is used.

type.title: Trigger Module Type UID
type.description: Identifies the Module Type used for creation of the Trigger Module.

configuration.title: Trigger Configuration
configuration.description: Used to define values of the configuration parameters of the Trigger Module.

conditions.title: Condition Modules
conditions.description: Contains definitions of Condition Modules of the Rule.

items.title: Condition Module
items.description: Defines the condition which permit to proceed with the Rule execution.

id.title: Condition uid
id.description: Identifies uniquely the Module in scope of the Rule.

label.title: Condition Label
label.description: Short (one word) user friendly name of the Module.

description.title: Condition Description
description.description: A brief description of what the Condition is and for what it is used.

type.title: Condition Module Type UID
type.description: Identifies the Module Type used for creation of the Condition.

configuration.title: Condition Configuration
configuration.description: Used to define values of the configuration parameters of the Condition.

inputs.title: Condition Input
inputs.description: Contains pairs of Input Name and Output reference in format - Module ID : Output Name.

actions.title: Action Modules
actions.description: Contains definitions of Action Modules of the Rule.

items.title: Action Module
items.description: Defines an Action which has to be executed by the Rule.

id.title: Action ID
id.description: Identifies uniquely the Module in scope of the Rule.

label.title: Action Label
label.description: Short (one word) user friendly name of the Module.

description.title: Action Description
description.description: A brief description of what the Action is and for what it is used.

type.title: Action Module Type UID
type.description: Identifies the Module Type used for creation of the Action.

configuration.title: Action Configuration
configuration.description: Used to define values of the configuration parameters of the Action.

inputs.title: Action Input
inputs.description: Contains pairs of Input Name and Output reference in format - Module ID : Output Name.

outputs.title: Action Output
outputs.description: Contains pairs of Output Name and Output reference. The reference defines what part of a complex data has to be used as value of this output.

name.title: Rule name
name.description: Short (one word) user friendly name of the Rule.

uid.title: Rule uid
uid.description: An unique identifier of the Rule in scope of the Rule Engine.

template.uid.title: Rule Template UID
template.uid.description: Used for description of the Rule. It must be unique in scope of Template Registry.

tags.title: Rule Tags
tags.description: Non-hierarchical keywords or terms describing the Rule. They help to classify the rules and allow them to be found.

items.title: Tag
items.description: Keyword or term describing the Rule.

description.title: Rule Description
description.description: A brief description of what the rule is and for what it is used.

configuration.title: Rule Configuration
configuration.description: Used to define values of the configuration parameters of the Rule.
